MColorArray¶

class MColorArray(*args)¶

Bases: OpenMaya.MColorArray

Attributes:
sizeIncrement

Number of elements by which to grow the array when necessary.

Methods

append Add a value to the end of the array.
clear Remove all elements from the array.
copy Replace the array contents with that of another or of a compatible Python sequence.
insert Insert a new value into the array at the given index.
remove Remove an element from the array.
setLength Grow or shrink the array to contain a specific number of elements.
